original_text: This is what the Lord God showed me: behold, he was forming locusts when the latter growth was just beginning to sprout, and behold, it was the latter growth after the king's mowings.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 내게 보이신 것이 이러하니라 왕이 풀을 벤 후 풀이 다시 움돋기 시작할 때에 주께서 메뚜기를 지으시매

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord God showed me:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 주 하나님이 내게 보여주신 것이니라

sentences.original_text: when the latter growth was just beginning to sprout,
it was the latter growth after the king's mowings.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 왕이 베고 난 뒤에 난 풀이었다
